Uses of Class
org.eclipse.keyple.calypso.transaction.PoSecuritySettings.PoSecuritySettingsBuilder

  • Packages that use PoSecuritySettings.PoSecuritySettingsBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.keyple.calypso.transaction
    Contains the services and POJOs providing the high-level API to manage PO selections and transactions.

    • Uses of PoSecuritySettings.PoSecuritySettingsBuilder in org.eclipse.keyple.calypso.transaction

      The default value is ENCRYPTED

      The default value is CLOSE_RATIFIED
